name: QuickShot (itch) (Dragonplayer62)
description:
I made this project to learn about networking and making a multiplayer game.

So in theory this game is Steam multiplayer ready, however for this release I removed the Steam Integration. It's just a very short showcase of the weapons and "features".

"Feautres:"

You can rocket jump and are also able to slide

Controls:

1 Pistol

2 Shotgun

3 Sniper (right click to aim)

4 Rocket launcher

LCTRL Slide

ESC Quit game

I now have huge respect for anyone insane enough to make a proper multiplayer game. I'll stay with singleplayer for the foreseeable future.
